app_description: AsianCrush brings the best of pan Asian entertainment to the West bridging language and cultural gaps to broaden the horizons of North American audiences beyond Hollywood. With a streaming library encompassing everything from award winning films blockbuster hits to iconic TV dramas anime AsianCrush is curated for the rapidly growing fandom of Asian media pop culture.
